items.longDescription:
- Stretchy cotton blend fabric that is lightweight but moderately crisp, so it maintains its shape.
- Machine-washable.
- Dries quickly after washing and maintains its shape so you can hang dry it.
- Made in a roomy fit that is perfect for this fabric, but the armholes have been carefully designed to avoid being too loose.
- We changed up the knitted fabrics for the body and ribbed cuffs, and connected them seamlessly.
- Adjusted the positioning of the collar ribbing seams for less skin irritation.
- The ribbing on the hem and cuffs has been continuously knitted for an elegant look.

items.shortDescription: An item that has both the premium feel of knitwear and a sporty design.
